name: ON REPEAT (notaroh)
description:
today is the day that you died. but then you woke up -- at the beginning of today. and then it happened again. and again. nobody else seems to notice. so it’s up to you, and you alone, to break the cycle and live to see a different day.

ON REPEAT is a TTRPG designed for one or two sessions. It's about being stuck in a time loop and trying to escape, inspired by media like Groundhog Day, Russian Doll, all the time loop stuff.

If you play it and have feedback, I'd love to hear it!
